text:
Brivo INC | Bethesda, MD (DC SUBS) | FULL-TIME | ONSITE

Brivo INC is a cloud based Physical Access Control Company. We offer a wide variety of access control and video solutions to a large range of customers. We're currently seeking talented developers, and operations personnel to help work on complex and interesting issues to provide our customers the best experience in cloud access control.

Our Current positions are available at http://www.brivo.com/about/careers/

we are also seeking Operations Personnel which has not been updated on the website yet but should shortly.

Additionally please contact zach.dixon@brivo.com with any questions and Ill be glad to answer / help.
